mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ro.buyNo, p.projectNo, p.brandNo, projectName, projectEndDate, p.categoryNo, categoryName, totalAmount, brandName, TO_CHAR(boughtDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') boughtDate, CASE WHEN projectEndDate-SYSDATE > 0 THEN 5 ELSE 6 END AS statusNo, CASE WHEN rc.cancelNo>0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS isCanceled FROM reward_buy_overview ro JOIN project p ON p.projectNo = ro.projectNo JOIN project_category pc ON p.categoryNo = pc.categoryNo JOIN brand b ON b.brandNo = p.brandNo LEFT OUTER JOIN reward_buy_cancel rc ON rc.buyNo = ro.buyNo WHERE ro.memberNo=#{memberNo} ORDER BY ro.buyNo DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY

SELECT ro.buyNo, ro.projectNo, projectName, p.categoryNo, categoryName, ro.shipAmount, ro.totalAmount, finalAmount, b.brandNo, brandName, projectEndDate, (projectEndDate - SYSDATE) remainDays, TO_CHAR(boughtDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') boughtDate, CASE WHEN rc.cancelNo>0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS isCanceled, CASE WHEN projectEndDate-SYSDATE > 0 THEN 5 ELSE 6 END AS statusNo FROM reward_buy_overview ro JOIN project p ON p.projectNo = ro.projectNo JOIN project_category pc ON pc.categoryNo = p.categoryNo JOIN brand b ON b.brandNo = p.brandNo LEFT OUTER JOIN reward_buy_cancel rc ON rc.buyNo = ro.buyNo WHERE ro.memberNo = #{memberNo} AND ro.buyNo = #{buyNo}

SELECT ro.buyNo, rewardTitle, rewardOption, optionAnswer, isShipping, TO_CHAR(startShippingDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') startShippingDate, amount, requestQuantity FROM reward_buy_detail rd JOIN reward r ON rd.rewardNo = r.rewardNo JOIN reward_buy_overview ro ON rd.buyNo = ro.buyNo JOIN project p ON p.projectNo = ro.projectNo WHERE ro.memberNo = #{memberNo} and ro.buyNo=#{buyNo}
mapper.update: INSERT INTO reward_buy_cancel(cancelNo, buyNo, canceledAmount, memo, canceledDate) SELECT reward_buy_cancel_seq.NEXTVAL, buyNo, finalAmount, #{memo}, SYSDATE FROM reward_buy_overview ro JOIN project p ON p.projectNo = ro.projectNo WHERE memberNo=#{memberNo} AND buyNo=#{buyNo} AND projectEndDate - SYSDATE >= 0
